abstract: The appeals court decision in support of theflyonthewall.com was  a victory for Internet companies, but media companies also cheered.
snippet: The appeals court decision in support of theflyonthewall.com was  a victory for Internet companies, but media companies also cheered.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court ruled on Monday that investment banks could not stop a financial Web site from immediately publishing the research recommendations of their stock analysts, delivering a blow to Wall Street and a win for the investing public.

headline.main: Big Banks Lose Ruling on Research
